name: queue-async
description: A little helper for asynchronous JavaScript.

scripts.pretest: mkdir -p build && node -e 'process.stdout.write("import queue from \"../index\"; queue.version = \"" + require("./package.json").version + "\"; export default queue;");' > build/bundle.js && rollup -f umd -u queue -n queue -o build/queue.js -- build/bundle.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/queue.js -c -m -o build/queue.min.js && rm -f build/queue.zip && zip -j build/queue.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/queue.js build/queue.min.js
